H

HNode - Class in <Unnamed>
HNode is the node of the HuffmanTree, which contains the variables holding the characters and the frequency of the characters, and also contains the reference to its child nodes.
HNode(String, int) - Constructor for class HNode
Constructs a node of the HuffmanTree with a character (in String) and frquency.
HuffmanTree - Class in <Unnamed>
Proof of concept of Huffman Coding.
HuffmanTree(File) - Constructor for class HuffmanTree
Constructs a HuffmanTree with a file passed in.

L

left - Variable in class HNode
 
lookupTableToString() - Method in class HuffmanTree
String representation of the lookup table.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class HuffmanTree
The main method allows the user use JFileChooser to choose a file and do the Huffman coding, and then displays original text, freqeuncy table, encoded/decoded message, Huffman Tree, lookup table, and average number of bits per symbol used corresponding to the file.
main(String[]) - Static method in class Point

showEverything() - Method in class HuffmanTree
This methods show the original text, the symbol frequency table, the Huffman Tree (include the 'symbol' and 'frequency' value for each node), the symbol/code table, the encoded message, the decoded message, and the average number of bits per symbol used in the encoded file.
showFreqTable() - Method in class HuffmanTree
Shows the frequency table, which displays each character and its frequency in each line.
